item.title: Expect the Comey and James Indictments to Be Dismissed Without Prejudice
item.description: The initial appointment of the prosecutor in these cases was untenable — and Bondi’s fix doesn’t work.

item.title: The War on Plastic Is Getting Out of Hand
item.description: We can rethink plastic waste solutions without draconian bans on effective cups, bags, and forks.

item.title: Nuremberg Puts Evil on the Stand
item.description: The film about the pivotal Nazi trials poses uncomfortable and critical questions.

item.title: Learning from Rembrandt at Florida’s Norton Museum of Art
item.description: He nurtured plenty of talented students whose work is on view along with the only Vermeer in private hands.

item.title: Congress Didn’t Give Trump an Unlimited License to Tariff
item.description: The best legal argument for the Trump tariffs assumes that we are currently in a declared war with every country on the planet.
